summary: replaces the last shout of the slow/time shout. it will almost freeze time for a duration of about 10 seconds.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will make it possible to shoot 3-7 arrows (depending on your archery skills) in a split second, or fusrodah someone from one angle, and watch him fly from another ;). Have fun! 

Be carefull, if you use it to fast after eachother the game might not get back to normal. A restart will suffice. This is due to the fact that a stop-time shout in a stop-time shout will make it slower to the square, thus freezing the game.  Use at your own risk, you have been warned.



INSTALLATION:

simply drop the superslowtimeslower.esp file into the data folder of your skyrim directory and you\'ll be good to go. Make sure you check the box in front of `superslowtimeslower` at the data files. 

If you want to de-install it, just remove the superslowtimeslower.esp file from the data folder of your skyrim directory. 

Feel free to leave any comments
author: dutchJSCOOP
